resources.string: "India is a country with over 1.3 billion population and in this crucial situation everyone is worried about vaccination. Finding a slot on the vaccination portal seems to be challenging for many people. We understand your situation. Vaccine Slot Alert App will help you in this situation. This app will send you a detailed notification if any slot open up for your desired location.You can set any location from any where in India. This app is fetching data from the Cowin server. Hope this app will help you to get vaccinated. "
